comments: Easiest but worst...To buy a textbook or not is a hard choice because he basically is just a copy machine of textbook...Extremely unorganized... He stays one month on easiest stuff and rushes through the final 3 chapters(which are most important and difficult) in 2 weeks...Finally he\'s gone...

Excellent professor. Original, fun, practical, always ready to learn and explore with students. Definitely recommend taking his class...but unfortunately he will not be teaching at MHC after spring 2009. :(
A brilliant professor! Very challenging, but insightful too. Learned a ton (a little more than I wanted to).
